headline: PPL, Blackstone JV to Build Natural Gas Plant for Data Center Support
summary: PPL forms a joint venture with Blackstone to power data centers with new gas-fired plants amid surging AI-driven energy demand.

raw.headline: PPL, Blackstone JV to Build Natural Gas Plant for Data Center Support
raw.summary: PPL forms a joint venture with Blackstone to power data centers with new gas-fired plants amid surging AI-driven energy demand.

headline: Southern Company's Power Plan Gets a Nod to Meet Surging AI Demand
summary: SO's forward-looking power plan gets approval from the Georgia regulator to expand capacity, enhance reliability and boost renewables amid AI growth drive.

raw.headline: Southern Company's Power Plan Gets a Nod to Meet Surging AI Demand
raw.summary: SO's forward-looking power plan gets approval from the Georgia regulator to expand capacity, enhance reliability and boost renewables amid AI growth drive.

headline: IDU: Utilities Dashboard For July
summary: Water utilities are undervalued by 17% versus 11-year averages. IDU and XLU ETFs have nearly identical long-term returns and risk. See more here.
